set terminal png size 800,600
set output '03.png'
set multiplot layout 1,1 rowsfirst title "PSO after 3 steps"
set xlabel 'dimension 0'
set ylabel 'dimension 1'
set xrange [-254.96236431295:200]
set yrange [-200:224.99347567177]
set arrow from 82.054494668669,99.180552491046 to 72.736866827062,123.44141510935
set arrow from 10.065753336234,33.746939581135 to 10.065753336234,33.746939581135
set arrow from -1.9747196027966,60.87405504546 to -25.390884825786,-8.4039600464863
set arrow from -66.81724999658,113.34809099388 to -254.96236431295,153.38957270678
set label "(0)" at 82.054494668669,99.180552491046
set label "(1)" at 10.065753336234,33.746939581135
set label "(2)" at -1.9747196027966,60.87405504546
set label "(3)" at -66.81724999658,113.34809099388
set grid
set arrow from -100,-100 to 100,-100 nohead
set arrow from -100,-100 to -100,100 nohead
set arrow from -100,100 to 100,100 nohead
set arrow from 100,-100 to 100,100 nohead
plot   '-' using 1:2 with lines title 'best global attractor footprints', '-' using 1:2 title 'positions', '-' using 1:2 title 'local attractors', '-' using 1:2 title 'global attractors'
